p: Our respondents also expressed their disappointment regarding the gradual loss of local knowledge regarding WMP harvesting on the island. This phenomenon was observed and widely discussed in other studies around the Mediterranean [ 36, 37], for example, in Albania [ 38], Turkey [ 39, 40], Spain [ 41], Italy [ 42], and Cyprus [ 37]. Multiple drivers were found to cause this knowledge decline, including the emerged urban lifestyles [ 36, 39, 42], the poverty stigma of wild plant gathering [ 37, 43], land use, and economic changes [ 5, 44].
